dataFilter.expressionTemplate: INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%1), %2, %2) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%1), 0,  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%1), 0,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3))) OR  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4), '-1', %5) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4), '-1', %6) AND  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%7), '-1', %8) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%7), '-1', %9) AND  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%10), '-1', %11) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%10), '-1', %12) AND  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%13), '-1', %14) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%13), '-1', %15) AND  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%16), '-1', %17) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%16), '-1',  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3)) AND  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%1), %2, '-1') <>  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%1),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), '-2')
